content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:

to become a W3Schooler, and get points for every exercise you complete.

The Exercise
The exercises are a mix of "multiple choice" and "fill in the blanks" questions. 
There are between 3 and 9 questions in each category.
The answer can be found in the corresponding tutorial chapter. If you're stuck, 
or answer wrong, you can try again or hit the "Show Answer" button to see the correct answer.

summary: This tutorial covers PythonExercises concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PythonExercises effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PythonExercises and how to apply it in your projects.
